headline: Allegion Boosts Product Portfolio With the Acquisition of Gatewise
summary: ALLE acquires Gatewise to expand its Zentra portfolio and streamline access control for multifamily properties.

raw.headline: Allegion Boosts Product Portfolio With the Acquisition of Gatewise
raw.summary: ALLE acquires Gatewise to expand its Zentra portfolio and streamline access control for multifamily properties.

headline: Allegion Expands Access Solutions Portfolio with Innovative Waitwhile Software Platform
summary: DUBLIN, July 08, 2025--Allegion plc (NYSE: ALLE), a leading global security products and solutions provider, through one of its subsidiaries, has acquired privately owned Waitwhile Inc. (Waitwhile), a leading software-as-a-service provider that specializes in cloud-based appointment scheduling and queue management.

raw.headline: Allegion Expands Access Solutions Portfolio with Innovative Waitwhile Software Platform
raw.summary: DUBLIN, July 08, 2025--Allegion plc (NYSE: ALLE), a leading global security products and solutions provider, through one of its subsidiaries, has acquired privately owned Waitwhile Inc. (Waitwhile), a leading software-as-a-service provider that specializes in cloud-based appointment scheduling and queue management.

headline: Allegion plc acquired Waitwhile, Inc.
summary: Allegion plc acquired Waitwhile, Inc. on July 8, 2025. Christoffer Klemming is joining Allegion. Klemming will continue leading the Waitwhile business, which has offices in the U.S. and Sweden....
